SnowblindThe spell was clearly named after Snowblind Studios, who produced Baldurs Gate Dark Alliance. was a short-range ice breath spell.
This spell was very similar to burning hands, but was essentially a cold version. As such, the user would release a cone of ice. However, it was more powerful, dealing more damage, but also draining more of the users energy.
This spell was known to be used around 1374 DR, particularly by the elf sorceress, Adrianna.
